Learn skills on demand for free

LinkedIn Learning is the new platform for free access to video tutorials that have been available from lynda.com; and although you will be asked if you want to connect this service to your LinkedIn account when you log in, you are not required to do this or to have a LinkedIn account.

  • Access LinkedIn Learning's online training video library for courses and tutorials on hundreds of topics.
  • Take a course on a topic like public speaking or marketing or search for a short video that helps you with software from Adobe and Microsoft.
  • The LinkedIn Learning online training library can be accessed by any current student, faculty or staff at UVA.
  • Important! UVA staff should access LinkedIn Learning through the Workday system to ensure credit for completed courses. Click “Learning” in the Workday interface.
